behavior prepare_to_slice_chicken(chicken: item, cutting_board: item, knife: item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, chicken)
        # Ensure the character is close to the chicken to slice
        achieve clean(chicken)
        # Ensure the chicken is clean before slicing
        achieve on(chicken, cutting_board)
        # Place the chicken on the cutting board for slicing
        achieve_once inhand(knife)
        # Temporarily hold the knife to slice the chicken
        achieve cut(chicken)
        # Achieve the goal of cutting the chicken

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select the chicken to be sliced
        
        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board)
        # Select the cutting board
        
        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife)
        # Select the knife for slicing

        prepare_to_slice_chicken(chicken, cutting_board, knife)

behavior slice_chicken(chicken:item, knife:item, cutting_board:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, chicken) # Ensure the character is close to the chicken
        achieve close_char(char, knife) # Ensure the character is close to the knife
        achieve close_char(char, cutting_board) # Ensure the character is close to the cutting board
        achieve_once inhand(knife) # Temporarily hold the knife to slice the chicken
        achieve cut(chicken) # Slice the chicken using the knife

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken) and id[chicken]==2017
        # Select the chicken with ID 2017
        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife)
        # Select a knife
        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board)
        # Select a cutting board
        
        slice_chicken(chicken, knife, cutting_board) # Slice the chicken into the desired pieces

def inhand_two_items(item1: item, item2: item):
    # Ensure the character holds two specific items
    symbol hold_items = exists char_item: item : inhand(char_item) and (char_item == item1 or char_i
tem == item2)
    return hold_items

behavior hold_knife_and_cutting_board(knife:item, cutting_board:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(knife)
        achieve_once inhand(cutting_board)

behavior slice_chicken(knife:item, cutting_board:item, chicken:item):
    body:
        if inhand_two_items(knife, cutting_board):
            # Both knife and cutting board are held
            achieve on(chicken, cutting_board) # Place the chicken on the cutting board
            achieve cut(chicken) # Slice the chicken with the knife

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken) and clean(chicken)
        # Select the chicken to be sliced and ensure its clean
        
        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife) and grabbable(knife)
        # Select a knife

        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board) and grabbable(cutting_board)
        # Select a cutting board
        
        hold_knife_and_cutting_board(knife, cutting_board)
        slice_chicken(knife, cutting_board, chicken)
